name: Gym Masters x VAL
description:
Participate in Gym Master's VAL Summer Games! 🔥

Download the exclusive Gym Masters x VAL and join the competition!

When? Mon, September 6th - Mon, Sept 13th.

Here is what you need to know:

  1. Purchase exclusive Gym Masters x VAL through this link.
  2. Play all three minigames and add the scores.
  3. Upload your combined score before Monday, September 13th using the form.
  4. Check the ruleset.
What are the prizes? 🤑 1st place: $250 2nd place: $150 3rd place: $50 4th place: $50

💥🎊 All participants will receive a special object to place in their gym when Gym Masters full release launches.
